entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deer Lake

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 04:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: SW 55 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:15 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:15 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 02:15 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 02:15 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
